successes.title: Thrilling Adventure Hour: The Graphic Novel... And Beyond!
successes.description: The star-studded stage show and Nerdist podcast sets its sights on a graphic novel, a scripted web series, and a live concert film!

Pledges.description: (DIGITAL GRAPHIC NOVEL PACKAGE) One advanced digital download of the graphic novel and our sincere gratitude.

(GRAPHIC NOVEL PACKAGE) One copy of the hardcover graphic novel anthology plus one digital copy for your personal use. Each book of our first print run will be hand numbered and signed. Your name will also be featured on our website as a friend of the TAH family. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(THE COMPLETE SPARKS NEVADA PODCAST COLLECTION) Already disappearing from iTunes, so get 'em here! Enjoy every podcast episode of Sparks Nevada, Marshal on Mars. Follow Sparks' journey from the very beginning with 25+ episodes of the podcast! Also includes the spin-off episodes “Cactoid Jim, King of the Martian Frontier,” “Tales of the USSA,” and “The Troubleshooters.” A Kickstarter exclusive.

(THE COMPLETE BEYOND BELIEF PODCAST COLLECTION) They're already disappearing from iTunes, so this may be your best chance to enjoy every podcast episode of Beyond Belief! Meet Frank and Sadie Doyle all over again in 23 episodes as they drink, clink, and, oh yes, see ghosts! A Kickstarter exclusive.

(BE THE BAND MUSIC PACKAGE) A collection of musical charts of the theme songs from the show. You get ten lead sheets off which the Andy Paley Orchestra actually plays. They contain the melody, lyrics (where applicable) and chords. Play the themes from Sparks Nevada, Captain Laserbeam, Colonel TickTock, Moonshine Holler, Ace American, Amelia Earhart, Jumbo the Elephant, Tales of the USSA, Cactoid Jim, and Beyond Belief!

(MORTIFIED LIVE PACKAGE) From our friend David Nadelberg, creator/host of the painfully funny Sundance Channel series the Mortified Sessions, come tickets for you and a guest to any live Mortified show in any of the 10 cities in which they take place. Your opportunity to see strangers reading their awkward teenage diaries and letters for your amusement! For more information visit http://getmortified.com/about/ Also receive a copy of one of the Mortified books, signed by Nadelberg and Acker & Blacker! Good until June 1, 2013.

(MORTIFIED LIVE PACKAGE) -- TAKE 2! From our friend David Nadelberg, creator/host of the painfully funny Sundance Channel series the Mortified Sessions, come tickets for you and a guest to any live Mortified show in any of the 10 cities in which they take place. Your opportunity to see strangers reading their awkward teenage diaries and letters for your amusement! For more information visit http://getmortified.com/about/ Also receive a copy of one of the Mortified books, signed by Nadelberg and Acker & Blacker! Good until June 1, 2013.

(CONCERT FILM PACKAGE) Pre-order a signed DVD of the live concert film mailed directly to your door! DVD bonus features will have tons of extra content, including the scripted web-series. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(THE EPIC TAH MUSIC COLLECTION) The official Thrilling Adventure Hour music collection! An impressive playlist of 40+ DRM-free songs - that's less than $1 a song! The playlist includes theme songs, songs from the Sparks Nevada musical “The Piano Has Been Thinking,” the Moonshine Holler Christmas episode, and Jumbo the Elephant. You’ve asked for this collection for years and now it can be yours! (+$10 for shipping internationally)
(GRAPHIC NOVEL PLUS PACKAGE) Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus your name printed in the graphic novel on our special thanks page dedicated to our backers. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(HIGHBROW ART PACKAGE) Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus a personalized, one-of-a-kind drawing (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from the extraordinarily versatile actor and extraordinarily poor artist, Mark Gagliardi. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(HIGHBROW ART PACKAGE -- TAKE TWO!) BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND!!! You receive our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus a personalized, one-of-a-kind drawing (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from the extraordinarily versatile actor and extraordinarily poor artist, Mark Gagliardi. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(HIGHBROW ART PACKAGE -- TAKE THREE!) BACK BY REALLY POPULAR DEMAND!!! You receive our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus a personalized, one-of-a-kind drawing (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from the extraordinarily versatile actor and extraordinarily in-demand Kickstarter artist, Mark Gagliardi. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(HIGHBROW ART PACKAGE -- TAKE FOUR!) BACK BY SUPER POPULAR DEMAND!!! You receive our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus a personalized, one-of-a-kind drawing (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from the extraordinarily versatile actor and TAH resident artist, Mark Gagliardi. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(HIGHBROW ART PACKAGE -- TAKE FIVE!) BACK BY UBER POPULAR DEMAND!!! You receive our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus a personalized, one-of-a-kind drawing (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from the extraordinarily versatile actor and now permanent TAH resident artist, Mark Gagliardi. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(PAINT-BY-HAL HIGH ART PACKAGE) An exclusive opportunity for more original artwork from a WorkJuice Player! Hal Lublin, the virtuoso who performs Gummy, Phillip Fathom, and more, has decided to learn how to paint... and what better time than now? So with our standard "Graphic Novel Package" you will receive a personalized, one-of-a-kind, stunningly unprofessional watercolor painting (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from Hal himself. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(PAINT-BY-HAL HIGH ART PACKAGE) TAKE TWO! An exclusive opportunity for more original artwork from a WorkJuice Player! Hal Lublin, the virtuoso who performs Gummy, Phillip Fathom, and more, has decided to learn how to paint... and what better time than now? So with our standard "Graphic Novel Package" you will receive a personalized, one-of-a-kind, stunningly unprofessional watercolor painting (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from Hal himself. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(PAINT-BY-HAL HIGH ART PACKAGE)--THIRD TIME AROUND! A rare opportunity for more original artwork from a WorkJuice Player! Hal Lublin, the virtuoso who performs Gummy, Phillip Fathom, and more, has decided to learn how to paint... and what better time than now? So with our standard "Graphic Novel Package" you will receive a personalized, one-of-a-kind, stunningly unprofessional watercolor painting (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from Hal himself. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(TODD THE CURTAIN MAN PACKAGE) SALE! Along with the standard “Graphic Novel Package,” you will receive an intimate look into the exciting life of the curtain man. You will receive a signed headshot of Todd the Curtain Man, three pictures from Teen Curtain Man Beat, a picture of the Largo Curtain signed by Largo owner Mr. Flanagan, and the Curtaineering Manifesto written by Todd himself.

(PAINT-BY-HAL HIGH ART PACKAGE)--TAKE 4! A rare opportunity for more original artwork from a WorkJuice Player! Hal Lublin, the virtuoso who performs Gummy, Phillip Fathom, and more, has decided to learn how to paint... and what better time than now? So with our standard "Graphic Novel Package" you will receive a personalized, one-of-a-kind, stunningly unprofessional watercolor painting (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from Hal himself. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(MARK GAGLIARDI HIGHBROW ART PACKAGE) You receive our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus a personalized, one-of-a-kind drawing (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from the extraordinarily versatile actor and extraordinarily terrible artist, Mark Gagliardi. Go here for an example of Mark's work: http://workjuice.tumblr.com/post/33251377008/art-by-mark-gagliardi (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(THE COMPLETE THRILLING ADVENTURE HOUR PODCASTS)
The oldest episodes have already started disappearing from iTunes, so this is your best chance to get them! Over 105 episodes Sparks Nevada, Beyond Belief, Ace American, Moonshine Holler, Captain Laserbeam, Jumbo, Amelia Earhart (and spin-offs and one-offs!), the two 90 minute Christmas episodes, plus unreleased ads, lost episodes of Sparks Nevada, Ace American, and Beyond Belief, and MORE! A Kickstarter exclusive.

(PAINT-BY-HAL HIGH ART PACKAGE)--TAKE 5! Let's make him paint an even 50! An opportunity for more original artwork from a WorkJuice Player! Hal Lublin, the virtuoso who performs Gummy, Phillip Fathom, and more, has decided to learn how to paint... and what better time than now? So with our standard "Graphic Novel Package" you will receive a personalized, one-of-a-kind, stunningly unprofessional watercolor painting (of a character of your choice or based upon a podcast episode of your choice) from Hal himself. (+$10 for shipping internationally)
Estimated delivery: Jul 2013

(COMICS & CHORDS COLLECTION) Everything from our "Graphic Novel Package" and our "Epic TAH Music Collection" combined into one incredible package! Please note that while the music collection is available in November 2012, the graphic novel is not slated for release until July 2013. (+$10 for shipping internationally)
(COMICS & CONCERT PACKAGE) Combine the “Concert Film Package” with our standard “Graphic Novel Package” to receive one big collectible set! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(WEB SERIES -- FOCUS GROUP MEMBER PACKAGE) As we translate the TAH experience into a scripted web series, our top priority is maintaining the tone, spirit, and fun of the live staged show. So we're asking YOU to become involved and chime into the creative process as one of our official focus group members. We'll send you exclusive "rough" and "final" versions of each episode long before the world sees the final cut. You will then receive various opportunities to voice your opinion, provide feedback, and help us to ensure that you and the rest of the TAH fan community will enjoy and embrace our web series. Every focus group member will receive special thanks as a credited member of our elite focus group in the end credits of each episode.

(WEB SERIES -- FOCUS GROUP MEMBER PACKAGE)--TAKE TWO! 
As we translate the TAH experience into a scripted web series, our top priority is maintaining the tone, spirit, and fun of the live staged show. So we're asking YOU to become involved and chime into the creative process as one of our official focus group members. We'll send you exclusive "rough" and "final" versions of each episode long before the world sees the final cut. You will then receive various opportunities to voice your opinion, provide feedback, and help us to ensure that you and the rest of the TAH fan community will enjoy and embrace our web series. Every focus group member will receive special thanks as a credited member of our elite focus group in the end credits of each episode.

(WEB SERIES -- FOCUS GROUP MEMBER PACKAGE) -- TAKE THREE! As we translate the TAH experience into a scripted web series, our top priority is maintaining the tone, spirit, and fun of the live staged show. So we're asking YOU to become involved and chime into the creative process as one of our official focus group members. We'll send you exclusive "rough" and "final" versions of each episode long before the world sees the final cut. You will then receive various opportunities to voice your opinion, provide feedback, and help us to ensure that you and the rest of the TAH fan community will enjoy and embrace our web series. Every focus group member will receive special thanks as a credited member of our elite focus group in the end credits of each episode.

(WEB SERIES -- FOCUS GROUP MEMBER PACKAGE) -- TAKE FOUR! As we translate the TAH experience into a scripted web series, our top priority is maintaining the tone, spirit, and fun of the live staged show. So we're asking YOU to become involved and chime into the creative process as one of our official focus group members. We'll send you exclusive "rough" and "final" versions of each episode long before the world sees the final cut. You will then receive various opportunities to voice your opinion, provide feedback, and help us to ensure that you and the rest of the TAH fan community will enjoy and embrace our web series. Every focus group member will receive special thanks as a credited member of our elite focus group in the end credits of each episode.
(COMICS & CONCERT & CHORDS PACKAGE) Combine the “Concert Film Package” with our “Comics & Chords” Package to receive the complete TAH set! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(COMIC ARTIST PACKAGE) Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus an exclusive portfolio review from a high-ranking editor at Archaia Entertainment. Share your work with the one of the best publishers in the industry today!

(WHAT’S MY LINE PACKAGE) Our actors read from printed scripts while performing on stage. They highlight their lines and write notes in the margins (blocking, motivations, etc.). By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one of the actual noted up scripts used by our actors, writers, or director during the show. Each script will be signed by the actor who used it. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(2013 POSTER SERIES PACKAGE) Twelve limited-edition 11” X 14” TAH graphic novel posters signed by as much as the cast as possible from each month’s LA performance for one entire year. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(TAH'S D-I-Y PODCAST KIT: JUNIOR ADVENTUREKATEER EDITION) It's Captain Laserbeam: the home game. You’ll receive a PDF of a Captain Laserbeam script, an audio bundle of sound effects, musical stings, the karaoke version of the theme song, and sheet music should you prefer to do it yourself. Best of all, send us your recording and we’ll share your performance online with our fans! Included with each package is an illustrated guide to Captain Laserbeam's many villains in Apex City and an official Adventurekateer Membership Card for Adventurekateers of all ages.

(TAH’S D-I-Y PODCAST KIT: SENIOR ADVENTUREKATEER EDITION) 
It's Beyond Belief: the home game. You’ll receive a PDF of a Beyond Belief script, an audio bundle of sound effects, musical stings, the Beyond Belief Suite (Frank and Sadie's theme) and sheet music should you prefer to do it yourself. Best of all, send us your recording and we’ll share your performance online with our fans! Also included in this package is a karaoke version of “Here's To Us” and two cocktail recipes "the Frank Doyle" and "the Sadie" designed by Adam Rogers -- a senior editor at Wired magazine who is writing a book on the science of alcohol called "The Alcohol Alchemist.”

(TAH’S D-I-Y PODCAST KIT: BUCKAROO EDITION) Be Sparks Nevada! Be Croach! Be Cactoid Jim or the Red Plains Rider. Get someone to be the Barkeep. We send you a PDF of the script, an audio bundle of sound effects, karaoke theme song, sheet music, and a pre-recorded acting coach lesson from stars Mark Gagliardi, Marc Evan Jackson, and Busy Philipps. Best of all, send us your recording and we’ll share your performance online with our fans!

(WHAT’S MY LINE PACKAGE -- TAKE TWO) BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND! Our actors read from printed scripts while performing on stage. They highlight their lines and write notes in the margins (blocking, motivations, etc.). By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one of the actual noted up scripts used by our actors, writers, or director during the show. Each script will be signed by the actor who used it. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(WHAT’S MY LINE PACKAGE -- TAKE THREE) BACK BY SUPER POPULAR DEMAND! Our actors read from printed scripts while performing on stage. They highlight their lines and write notes in the margins (blocking, motivations, etc.). By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one of the actual noted up scripts used by our actors, writers, or director during the show. Each script will be signed by the actor who used it. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(SIGNED PORTRAIT PACKAGE) For the past six months, we've had some amazing photographers come backstage to take photos of our actors and guest stars. You can see many of them on our website and tumblr. By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one glossy photo of any WorkJuice Player of YOUR CHOICE, signed by the Player him or herself. (+$10 for shipping internationally).

WHAT’S MY LINE PACKAGE -- TAKE THREE) BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND! Our actors read from printed scripts while performing on stage. They highlight their lines and write notes in the margins (blocking, motivations, etc.). By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one of the actual noted up scripts used by our actors, writers, or director during the show. Each script will be signed by the actor who used it. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(SIGNED PORTRAIT PACKAGE) TAKE TWO! For the past six months, we've had some amazing photographers come backstage to take photos of our actors and guest stars. You can see many of them on our website and tumblr. By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one glossy photo of any WorkJuice Player of YOUR CHOICE, signed by the Player him or herself. (+$10 for shipping internationally).

(HIGH BROW ART PACKAGE – JACKSON PUBLICK STYLE) Mark Gagliardi and Hal Lublin have lowered the bar with their absence of fine artistic talent. Now the bar will stay where it is, as amazing artists will produce hilariously bad artwork featuring the TAH character or scene of your choice. Jackson (The Venture Bros.) Publick will doodle a personalized, one-of-a-kind doodle for you. Receive a TAH character or scene of your choice as it was meant to be received: in doodle form! Like our other High Brow Art Packages, our standard "Graphic Novel Package" is included in this reward tier.

(HIGH BROW ART PACKAGE – BED EDLUND STYLE) Mark Gagliardi and Hal Lublin have lowered the bar with their absence of fine artistic talent. Now the bar will stay where it is, as amazing artists will produce hilariously bad artwork featuring the TAH character or scene of your choice. Ben (The Tick) Edlund will spend exactly five minutes on a personalized, one-of-a-kind sketch for you. How much will he finish? Who knows? He's fast. Will you love it? For sure. He invented the dang Tick. We will post the five minutes he spends on your sketch on youtube and include the link with the artwork. Like our other High Brow Art Packages, our standard "Graphic Novel Package" is included in this reward tier.

(SIGNED PORTRAIT PACKAGE) TAKE 3! For the past six months, we've had some amazing photographers come backstage to take photos of our actors and guest stars. You can see many of them on our website and tumblr. By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one glossy photo of any WorkJuice Player of YOUR CHOICE, signed by the Player him or herself. (+$10 for shipping internationally).

(CONCERT FILM -- WHAT’S MY LINE PACKAGE) Our actors read from printed scripts while performing on stage. They highlight their lines and write notes in the margins (blocking, motivations, etc.). By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one of the actual noted-up scripts used by our actors, guest stars, writers, or director during this one-time performance. Each script will be signed by the actor who used it. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(TAH CAST POSTER PACKAGE) Since the response to our limited-edition 11" X 14" TAH poster was so strong, we decided to donate some posters from our own stash. From the past six months of performances, we've collected 20 TAH-themed posters signed by various members of the WorkJuice Players and many of our guest stars including Nathan Fillion, George Wendt, David Anders, Linda Cardellini, Patrick Warburton, and more. Each package will include one poster and our standard graphic novel package. The kind of poster and the number/owners of signatures on each poster are unique to each item, so each is a one-of-a-kind piece of our personal TAH collection. We're sad to see them go, but they belong to the fans! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(WEB SERIES -- WHAT’S MY LINE WEB SERIES EDITION) There will be a script for the web-series, which means all actors will be marking them up by highlighting their lines, writing notes in the margins (blocking, motivations, etc.), and more. By donating to this tier, you will receive our standard “Graphic Novel Package” as well one of the actual noted up scripts used by our actors, writers, or director during the show. Each script will be signed by the person who used it. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(TAH CAST POSTER PACKAGE)--FINAL OFFERING! From the past six months of performances, we've collected 20 TAH-themed posters signed by various members of the WorkJuice Players and many of our guest stars including Nathan Fillion, David Anders, Linda Cardellini, Patrick Warburton, and more. Each package will include one poster and our standard graphic novel package. The kind of poster and the number/owners of signatures on each poster are unique to each item, so each is a one-of-a-kind piece of our personal TAH collection. We're sad to see them go, but they belong to the fans! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(SPARKS NEVADA POW! PACKAGE) Kids, don your robot fists for real, because these Sparks Nevada collectibles are finally available... because YOU demanded it! Paul Pape Designs has produced a limited run of original Sparks Nevada robot fists (one-size-fits-all, like those Hulk Hands). Each package also includes an official Marshal of Mars star badge and a personalized thank you note from Sparks Nevada himself, Marc Evan Jackson. (+$10 shipping domestically, +$15 shipping internationally)

(THE PAUL F. COMEDY PACKAGE) WorkJuice Player Paul F. Tompkins is the funnest comic around. Find out why with this reward which includes ALL of Paul's recordings: 3 CD's (Impersonal, Freak Wharf, Laboring Under Delusions: Live in Brooklyn) and 2 DVD's (You Should Have Told Me and Laboring Under Delusions), PLUS the not on iTunes/in stores/on Amazon "Sir, You Have Fooled Me Twice" EP! Each item will be signed by Paul with a personal message to you! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(SPARKS NEVADA POW! PACKAGE) 2ND OFFERING! Kids, don your robot fists for real, because these Sparks Nevada collectibles are finally available... because YOU demanded it! Paul Pape Designs has produced a limited run of original Sparks Nevada robot fists (one-size-fits-all, like those Hulk Hands). Each package also includes an official Marshal of Mars star badge and a personalized thank you note from Sparks Nevada himself, Marc Evan Jackson. (+$10 shipping domestically, +$15 shipping internationally)
(PAGET BREWSTER HANDMADE STEAMPUNK RING PACKAGE) A handmade "steampunk" ring made from vintage watch parts crafted by our own Paget Brewster.  (+$10 for shipping internationally)
(PAGET BREWSTER HANDMADE STEAMPUNK CUFFLINK PACKAGE) A handmade set of "steampunk" cufflinks made from vintage watch parts crafted by our own Paget Brewster. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(PAGET BREWSTER HANDMADE STEAMPUNK RING PACKAGE -- TAKE TWO) BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND! After the incredible response from our first offering, Paget has graciously offered to handmake five more "steampunk" rings made from vintage watch parts. Each ring is handmade by Paget herself and no two rings are alike! Scoop them up quick! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(BEYOND BELIEF UNPLUGGED) We need to re-record two episodes of Beyond Belief for the podcast. Which is good news for you because we'll need a very small audience! Join Paul F. Tompkins, Paget Brewster, Superego's Matt Gourley, John Ross Bowie, and more special guests at this intimate, stripped down recording session. Audience members will receive photo-time with the actors, signed scripts, and more surprises! Recording will take place some time between Nov 7-30 in Los Angeles. Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.

(BEYOND BELIEF UNPLUGGED) TAKE 2! We need to re-record two episodes of Beyond Belief for the podcast. Which is good news for you because we'll need a very small audience! Join Paul F. Tompkins, Paget Brewster, Superego's Matt Gourley, John Ross Bowie, and more special guests at this intimate, stripped down recording session. Audience members will receive photo-time with the actors, signed scripts, and more surprises! Recording will take place some time between Nov 7-30 (probably 11/17) in Los Angeles. Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.

(PAGET'S RING PACKAGE #1) Paget Brewster loves jewelry. But she also wants to see this concert film get made. So she's donated this very cool QUARTZY-LOOKING, SHINY-LOOKING RING which she's had since she waited tables in her twenties! She hates to part with it, but she knows a lucky fan will appreciate it the most. (+$10 for International Shipping)

(PAGET'S RING PACKAGE #2) Paget Brewster loves jewelry. But she also wants to see this concert film get made. So she's donated this very cool EYEBALL RING which she wore when she was last on Conan! She hates to part with it, but she knows a lucky fan will appreciate it the most. (+$10 for International Shipping)

(PAUL F. BOWTIE PACKAGE) Don't know how to tie a bow tie? Paul F. Tompkins will make you a PERSONAL HOW-TO VIDEO. He will guide you through all the steps! And if you need more than a person tutorial, this package includes a bow tie from Paul's personal collection! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(BEYOND BELIEF UNPLUGGED) TAKE 3! We need to re-record two episodes of Beyond Belief for the podcast. Which is good news for you because we'll need a very small audience! Join Paul F. Tompkins, Paget Brewster, Maria Bamford, Marc Evan Jackson, Hal Lublin, Linda Cardellini, Molly Quinn, Superego's Matt Gourley, and John Ross Bowie at this intimate, stripped down recording session. Audience members will receive photo-time with the actors, signed scripts, and more surprises! Recording will take place 11/17 at 2pm in Los Angeles. Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.

(MARC E BOWTIE PACKAGE) Marc Evan Jackson, who has played Sparks Nevada, Marshal on Mars wearing a bow tie invariably during every performance, will teach you, in his words "How to really tie a bow tie."
He will guide you through all the steps "for real!" And if you need more than a personal tutorial, this package includes a bow tie from Paul F. Tompkins's personal collection!

(THE WORKJUICE COMPLETE BREAKFAST PACKAGE) Enjoy your new graphic novel with WorkJuice Brand Coffee! This caffeinated care package includes our King of Coffee mug, featuring the mug of the King himself, Paul F. Tompkins. You'll also receive a collectable WorkJuice Coffee Tin designed by TAH merch designer Paul Pape, and a pound of WorkJuice Brand Coffee, specially roasted by Nebraskan specialty roasters, A Hill of Beans. And while you're coffeeing up for the day, read over personalized, hand-written notes from Acker & Blacker, Paul Pape, and the King of Coffee himself! Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" is included in this package. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(ADVENTUREKATEER PACKAGE) Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus our artist will take your child’s likeness and draw them as one of the three Adventurekateers accompanying Captain Laserbeam on his comic book adventure. This character will then be named after your child and forever immortalized as part of our world. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(CAMEO PACKAGE) Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" plus one of our artists on the graphic novel anthology will take your likeness and incorporate you somewhere in the graphic novel. The fun is flipping through the book and seeing where you appear! Are you a villain fighting Captain Laserbeam? A ghost haunting Frank and Sadie Doyle’s liquor cabinet? Read the book and find out! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(NATALIE NOURIGAT ORIGINAL ARTWORK) SALE! Along with our standard graphic novel package, receive either a page of original artwork from our graphic novel or an original, one-of-a-kind 11 X 17 watercolor commission of Amelia Earhart herself from the talented Natalie Nourigat, one of our contributors on our graphic novel anthology. Enjoy more of her work at http://natalienourigat.com. (+$10 for US shipping, +$15 for international shipping)

(EVAN "DOC" SHANER ORIGINAL ART PACKAGE) SALE! Along with our standard Graphic
Novel package, receive either a page of original artwork from our graphic novel or an original, one-of-a-kind TAH-themed piece of art from the marvelous Doc Shaner, one of our contributors on our graphic novel anthology. Enjoy more of his work at http://www.evanshaner.com. (+$10 for shipping, +$15 for international shipping)

(JEFF STOKELY ORIGINAL ART PACKAGE) Along with our standard graphic novel package, receive the actual original page of artwork produced for our graphic novel anthology by Jeff Stokely, one of our incredible contributors on the book. Enjoy more of his work at http://www.jeffstokely.com. (+$10 for shipping, +$15 for international shipping)

(NICK KROLL PACKAGE) SALE! One of our favorite guest stars, comedian/actor Nick Kroll, will record a voice message for you as one of his popular characters: Bobby Bottleservice, El Chupacabra, Fabrice Fabrice, or any other of your choosing! And, because he's a mensch, Nick is throwing in a signed poster from his new Comedy Central series, The Nick Show Kroll!

(CONCERT FILM ATTENDEE -- FIRST IN LINE PACKAGE) SALE! We are only allowed to invite 125 people to the private recording of the live concert film. This first batch of general admission seats are reserved for our first 25 backers willing to jump on the concert film train early. Earn bragging rights among your friends, not to mention killer seats and some exclusive swag for standing first in line. Reserve your seat today and become one of the few audience members to experience this incredible event. Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.

(CONCERT FILM ATTENDEE -- SECOND IN LINE PACKAGE) SALE! We are only allowed to invite 125 people to the private recording of the live concert film. This next batch of general admission seats are reserved for our second 25 backers willing to jump on the concert film train. Earn bragging rights among your friends, not to mention killer seats and some exclusive swag for standing so close to the front of the line. Reserve your seat today and become one of the few audience members to experience this incredible event. Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.
(DIGITAL FIRESIDE CHAT WITH JAMES URBANIAK) SALE! A 30-minute Skype chat with WorkJuice Player James Urbaniak (Dr. Venture on The Venture Brothers) about life, the industry, whatever you’d like!

(DIGITAL FIRESIDE CHAT WITH AARON GINSBURG) SALE! A 30-minute Skype chat with TAH’s director Aaron Ginsburg about life, the industry, whatever you’d like! If you're in LA, this chat can also be done in person. But be warned: you never know who Aaron is going to bring with him!

(RANDY BISHOP ORIGINAL ART PACKAGE) Along with our standard graphic novel package, receive either a page of original artwork from our graphic novel or an original, one-of-a-kind TAH-themed piece of art from the talented Randy Bishop, one of our contributors on our graphic novel anthology. Enjoy more of his work at http://www.randybishopart.com. (+$10 for shipping, +$15 for international shipping)

(DIGITAL FIRESIDE CHAT WITH JEFF GREENSTEIN) SALE! Chat with writer/director Jeff Greenstein (Desperate Housewives, Will & Grace, Dream On, director of Husbands) about Hollywood, writing, directing, TV, or anything!

(PAUL F. COMMENTARY PACKAGE) You love movies. Paul F. Tompkins also loves movies, and he is very funny when he talks about movies. Says Paul: I am offering a feature-length "director's commentary" for the FILM OF YOUR CHOICE, performed as one of my characters from The Pod F. Tompkast & Comedy Bang Bang. You name the film, ANY film, and I will watch it and provide commentary as either Andrew Lloyd Webber or Garry Marshall. A long movie like "There Will Be Blood"? Sure! A dumb movie like "Days of Thunder"? I'll do it! NO PORN."

(PAUL F. COMMENTARY PACKAGE) -- 2ND OFFER! You love movies. Paul F. Tompkins also loves movies, and he is very funny when he talks about movies. Says Paul: I am offering a feature-length "director's commentary" for the FILM OF YOUR CHOICE, performed as one of my characters from The Pod F. Tompkast & Comedy Bang Bang. You name the film, ANY film, and I will watch it and provide commentary as either Andrew Lloyd Webber or Garry Marshall. A long movie like "There Will Be Blood"? Sure! A dumb movie like "Days of Thunder"? I'll do it! NO PORN."

(GENUINE GRATITUDE FROM FICTIONAL PEOPLE PACKAGE) A personalized video from your character of choice: Philip Fathom, “Spooky Narrator,” or Gummy the hobo (Hal Lublin); Colonel Tick Tock, Felton, or Doktor Vitus Brunholdt (Craig Cackowski); Abby Adams, or “Robot Doors” (Annie Savage); Adventurekateer Brian, Croach the Tracker, or Carlysle Ravencastle, Dark Husband to the Midnight (Mark Gagliardi); Nightmares the Clown (James Urbaniak); or Amelia Earhart (Autumn Reeser). We can customize and personalize your video message for another recipient (birthdays, marriages, graduations, divorces, even your voicemail!). Also available as voicemail/audio file.

(ASSISTANT EDITOR PACKAGE) Eager to gain some real-world experience in publishing? With this tier, you will receive an assistant editor credit on the graphic novel as Joe LeFavi (our anthology’s editor) will teach you about the editorial process, involve you in the creative process as the book takes shape, and even welcome feedback during key moments of the book’s development. And with an official credit on a quality graphic novel sold in stores nationwide, who knows where your career can go! Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" included. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(WORKJUICE LOYALTY OATH PACKAGE)  We’re giving away five (5) slots per month for the first five performances starting in January 2013. Come join the cast at the end of one performance at the Coronet Theatre in LA to sing the WorkJuice Anthem! Backers are responsible for their own travel, lodging, and tickets to show. And since you’re a part of the WorkJuice family now, @THRILLINGADV will follow you on Twitter. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(ASSISTANT EDITOR PACKAGE -- TAKE TWO) After receiving quite a few requests to offer this reward again, we're providing one more assistant editor credit on the book. But that's it! We must avoid welcoming too many cooks into the comic kitchen. So are you eager to gain some real-world experience in publishing? With this tier, you will receive an assistant editor credit on the graphic novel as Joe LeFavi (our anthology’s editor) will teach you about the editorial process, involve you in the creative process as the book takes shape, and even welcome feedback during key moments of the book’s development. And with an official credit on a quality graphic novel sold in stores nationwide, who knows where your career can go! Our standard "Graphic Novel Package" included. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(THE CURTAINEER'S APPRENTICE PACKAGE) Spend the evening with Todd the Curtaineer backstage as you watch the entire TAH experience from behind the curtain. One person only will shadow Todd and learn the ropes (literally!) as you enjoy backstage access. (In this reward, you get to watch the show from the wings with the cast!) If you’re ready by show's end, you can even pull the final curtain. Backers will also receive everything included in the “Todd the Curtain Man” Package.” Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.

(CHRISTMAS ON MARS PACKAGE) Want to give your friend or loved one one unforgettable present this holiday season? Join the cast on stage at the end of our epic Holiday 2012 performance, Dec 8 at Largo in LA as we all perform the WorkJuice Anthem. This is traditionally our most star-studded performance of the year. Previous guests have included Nathan Fillion, Michael Hogan, Paul Scheer, Gillian Jacobs, Colin Hanks, and more. There is only enough room for five (5) people to join in the fun (per show), so reserve your spaces today for the 7:30 PM and the 10 PM show! Backers are responsible for their own travel, lodging, and ticket to the show. And since you’re a part of the WorkJuice family now, @THRILLINGADV will follow you on Twitter. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(THE KING OF COFFEE’S THRONE PACKAGE) We reserve you the best seat in the house during one live 2013 performance at the Coronet Theater in LA. This package includes a King of Coffee crown, which you’ll be graciously permitted by the King of Coffee to wear for one night. Anyone wearing this crown is sure to experience one unforgettable night, as our cast members will be encouraged to seek you out in the crowd after the show and personally thank you for your support. And should the King of Coffee make an appearance, he will make it a point to glare directly at you the entire time, or perhaps reclaim his king-hat after the show. Backers are responsible for their own travel, lodging, and ticket to the show. (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(SCOTCH WITH SPARKS) Drinks with Marc Evan Jackson (scotch only and you’re buying) at the famous Roger Room in Los Angeles for an insightful and slightly inebriated chat about the industry. Skype or Facetime chats also available for backers without access to travel, but Marc will still be drinking and he expects you to do the same. Plus, you never know whom he'll bring along! Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.

on LAST RESORT) about life, the industry, whatever you’d like!

(DIGITAL FIRESIDE CHAT WITH AMBER BENSON) Chat with Amber Benson (Buffy the Vampire Slayer; Supernatural; co-director of Drones; author of the Calliope Reaper-Jones series) about reading, writing, acting, directing, or anything! (VIP CONCERT FILM PACKAGE) The first two rows in the house are being reserved for our VIP backers. These seats are commonly the best seats in the house. (WEB SERIES -- PA FOR A DAY PACKAGE) SALE! A production assistant (or “PA”) is one of the most valuable roles on the production team. They assist certain members of the cast and crew, contribute to the production efforts, run errands, arrange special events… it’s real and rewarding work. For those of you wanting to share in the fun and enjoy not only exclusive access to the TAH experience, but the ability to literally help us to produce and create the end product seen all over the world… this reward is for you! Your assignment will last for one full day during the production currently scheduled for the first quarter of 2013. Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging. You'll also receive an exclusive TAH crew T-shirt and receive a credit as our production assistant on our web series, gaining real-world production experience in the entertainment industry!

(MEET THE CREATORS AND JANE ESPENSON) Enjoy one-on-one-on-one-on-one drinks with TAH creators Acker & Blacker and legendary TV multi-hyphenate Jane Epsenson (Husbands, Game of Thrones, Buffy, BSG, Dollhouse, Caprica, Torchwood, Eureka, Firefly, and more)! Enjoy witty banter, true Hollywood tales, and the answers to your burning nerd questions! Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging.

(CONCERT FILM -- THE CURTAINEER'S APPRENTICE PACKAGE) Spend the evening with Todd the Curtaineer backstage as you watch the entire TAH experience from behind the curtain. Backers will receive everything included in the “Todd the Curtain Man” Package.” Your assignment will last for one day during the production currently scheduled for fall 2013. You'll also receive an exclusive TAH crew T-shirt and an official credit in the end credits as our “curtaineer’s apprentice” on our concert film, gaining real-world production experience in the entertainment industry! Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging. Package includes one general admission to the live concert film performance.

Don't have the Sparks Nevada collection? Don't worry; we'll include it, as well as a personalized note from Paul, Acker & Blacker, and Sparks himself, Marc Evan Jackson! (+$10 for shipping internationally)

(WEB SERIES -- ELITE VIP TABLE READ PACKAGE) SALE! This reward reserves one seat for you and only you to attend the private table read, during which the entire cast reads through the script in character. You'll also receive a signed script of the web series from various cast members. The table read will take place in the first quarter of 2013. (WEB SERIES -- WRITER’S ASSISTANT PACKAGE) SALE! Shadow Ben Acker & Ben Blacker, the creators of TAH and the writers of our web series. And as you’re their assistant, you’ll play a vital role during the creative process! (CONCERT FILM -- ASSOCIATE PRODUCER PACKAGE) Eager for a more immersive experience? Backers of this incredibly exclusive tier will receive the Associate Producer treatment, being welcomed into the creative process as the concert film takes shape over the next few months. You'll first receive a signed script of the concert film from various cast members and the opportunity to provide feedback during the creative process. Once the script is approved by the team, you wield the power of your credit and gain exclusive access to all facets of the production. From the table read to the night of the performance, your credit gives you access to attend anything associated with the production. Finally, when the final performance takes place, we will reserve you a special seat in the audience just for you and a guest. With this package you will also receive an exclusive TAH crew T-shirt and a signed copy of the final DVD, which will contain your name in the official credits as “associate producer”. We'll even list your name on IMDb! Pre-production will commence as early as late 2012 and extend until the night of the production in Fall 2013. Backers are responsible for their own travel and lodging to any and all events. Package includes two VIP admissions to the live concert film performance.

You will enjoy the spoils of the "associate producer package" on each of the stretch goals successfully funded by this campaign. Your name will be featured in the opening and end credits on its own title card as one of our associate producers on each of our Kickstarter-funded productions. And you will receive a personalized complimentary copy of each of your credited works from the WorkJuice Players, which you can also sign yourself since you're now a part of the team. And if that's not enough, we'll toss in a TAH crew T-shirt available only to our elite production crew. Our fans will thank you. We'll adore you. And your legacy will last forever.
